translation.en: -[bat strikes ball] -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创纪录片

translation.en: [announcer] Line drive to right field...
translation.zh: 是飞向右外场的直飞球

translation.en: [man] Solemnly swear the testimony you're about to give will be the truth...
translation.zh: …庄严地发誓你的证词句句属实

translation.en: [Marion Jones] I have never, ever failed a drug test.
translation.zh: 每次兴奋剂检测我都是通过的

translation.en: Before, during and after the Olympics.
translation.zh: 包括在奥运会之前 之间和之后

translation.en: Over 160 drug tests.
translation.zh: 160多次兴奋剂检测

translation.en: I have never failed a test.
translation.zh: 我没有一次不通过

translation.en: [woman] For the record, have you ever used human growth hormone
translation.zh:
为了记录在案 你是否曾经
使用过人类生长激素

translation.en: or any other performance-enhancing substance?
translation.zh: 或任何其他增强表现的药物？

translation.en: [Lance Armstrong] No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: [man] I'm trying to make sure your testimony's clear.
translation.zh: 我只是想确保你的证词清楚

translation.en: [Armstrong] How many times do I have to say it? I've never taken drugs.
translation.zh:
我到底要说多少次呢？
我从未服用过兴奋剂

translation.en: [man] You're winning the Tour de France...
translation.zh: 你会赢得环法自行车赛…

translation.en: [Armstrong] How clear is that? [man] ...win the Tour de France,
translation.zh:
-这样够清楚吗？
-…想赢环法自行车赛

translation.en: like the all-time greats who've ever won this big event.
translation.zh:
就像曾经赢得这场盛大赛事的
常胜将军一样

translation.en: [Armstrong] Extraordinary accusations...
translation.zh: 非凡的指控

translation.en: must be followed up with extraordinary proof.
translation.zh: 后续必须有非凡的证据

translation.en: And they have not come up with extraordinary proof.
translation.zh: 他们还没有提出非凡的证据

translation.en: [Bryan Fogel] See... We have...
...this mountain bike.
translation.zh: 这是一辆山地自行车

translation.en: Loading up the Thule rack.
translation.zh: 装在拓乐自行车架上

translation.en: And this is my entire life in the car right now,
translation.zh: （科罗拉多州博尔德市） 现在我全部的生活都在车上

translation.en: set up, ready for insanity.
translation.zh: 做好准备 准备疯狂

translation.en: I'm getting ready for the single hardest amateur cycling event in the world.
translation.zh:
我在为全世界难度最大的
业余自行车赛做准备

translation.en: It's basically a miniature Tour de France for insane people.
translation.zh:
它基本上就是为疯狂的人而设的
微型环法自行车赛

translation.en: [man] Does it qualify for anything if you do well with it?
translation.zh:
如果比赛成绩出色
能获得什么资格吗？

translation.en: [Fogel] Yeah, stupidity.
translation.zh: 能 做蠢人的资格

translation.en: I've been riding for 28 years seriously, but never as a professional.
translation.zh:
我已经骑了28年
但从来没有做过专业选手

translation.en: Going to these massive amateur events that are not professional,
translation.zh:
去参加这种大型的业余比赛
不是专业赛

translation.en: but, I mean, there's serious guys there. And the... [laughs]
translation.zh: 但有很多认真的人 而且…

translation.en: -Max! He loves... He's got a foot fetish. -[man laughs] It tickles!
translation.zh:
-麦克斯！它超爱…它有恋足癖
-好痒！

translation.en: [Fogel] I certainly didn't know when I started on this
translation.zh: 开始的时候

translation.en: what it was gonna lead to.
translation.zh: 我不清楚未来会如何

translation.en: When LeMond won that first Tour de France,
translation.zh: 莱蒙德第一次赢得环法自行车赛时

translation.en: I was in seventh grade, I think.
translation.zh: 我应该是上七年级

translation.en: [man] Can you believe it? After over 2,000 miles...
translation.zh: 诸位能相信吗？3200多公里后…

translation.en: His name in French means "the world,"
translation.zh:
他的名字在法语里
是“全世界”的意思

translation.en: and this is the world of Greg LeMond in Paris today.
translation.zh: 今天的巴黎是格雷格莱蒙德的世界

translation.en: [Fogel] Being the first American to win it, it really brought me into the sport.
translation.zh:
作为第一个赢得这个比赛的美国人
让我真的迷上了这项运动

translation.en: I ate a wheel going about 40 miles an hour.
translation.zh:
我从车上摔下来
当时的时速骑到了64公里

translation.en: I spent my entire freshman year of college with plastic teeth in my mouth.
translation.zh:
我整个大学一年级
嘴里都是塑料牙齿

translation.en: I would've kept racing if it wasn't for that.
translation.zh: 若不是那样 我会一直比赛

translation.en: [Fogel] Later, Armstrong came along. That was a whole other ball of wax.
translation.zh:
后来 兰斯阿姆斯特朗出来了
这就成了一种全新的比赛

translation.en: [man] ...off the back wheel of Armstrong,
translation.zh: …跟着兰斯阿姆斯特朗的后轮

translation.en: -they can't respond to pressure. -[man 2] The gap is there.
translation.zh:
-…他们无法应对这种压力
-差距摆在那里呢

translation.en: He is just going faster and faster and faster.
translation.zh: 他骑得越来越快

translation.en: [man] This has to be the greatest comeback in any sport.
translation.zh:
这肯定是所有运动史上
最精彩的卷土重来了

translation.en: The fact that Armstrong managed to conquer cancer was unbelievable.
translation.zh:
阿姆斯特朗成功战胜癌症
就已经非常不可思议了

translation.en: Now he's riding at the front of the Tour de France like a Trojan.
translation.zh:
现在他像个勇士般
在环法自行车赛上独占鳌头

translation.en: [Fogel] I think I'm a year and a half younger than Lance.
translation.zh: 我想我比兰斯小一岁半

translation.en: He was kind of my hero.
translation.zh: 他是我心中的英雄

translation.en: [Oprah Winfrey] For now, I'd just like a yes or a no.
translation.zh: 现在 我只要你回答有或没有

translation.en: Did you ever take banned substances to enhance your cycling performance?
translation.zh:
为了提高骑行成绩
你有没有服用过违禁药物？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 有

translation.en: [Fogel] I'd always suspected that he had been doping.
translation.zh:
（曾经的兰斯！
阿姆斯特朗将被剥夺环法七冠） 我以前就时常暗自怀疑
他一直在服用兴奋剂

translation.en: I felt that I didn't really wanna know.
translation.zh: 我感觉我不是很想知道

translation.en: Because a lot of the guys that he raced with
translation.zh:
因为我在过去几年中认识的
他的很多队友

translation.en: and guys who had raced against him that I'd just known over the years...
translation.zh: 和竞争对手…

translation.en: they were my friends.
translation.zh:
他们都是我的朋友 （戴夫扎布里斯基
兰斯阿姆斯特朗的队友）

translation.en: If you would've had your choice, you would've never doped?
translation.zh:
如果可以选择
你会永远不碰兴奋剂吗？

translation.en: -[mutters] -[Fogel] Ever?
translation.zh:
-对 但是…
-永不？

translation.en: Up until it directly affected me,
translation.zh: 直到它直接影响我

translation.en: I was like, "I think Lance is probably clean." [chuckles]
translation.zh:
我一直是
“我觉得兰斯可能是清白的”

translation.en: [Dave Zabriskie] I don't know.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: It's... messy.
translation.zh: 很混乱

translation.en: [Fogel] The way they got him, this is what nobody understood.
translation.zh: 他们查到他的方式 没有人能理解

translation.en: [Armstrong] 150 times over the last six years, I've been tested.
translation.zh: 最近六年中 我做了150多次检测

translation.en: In competition, out of competition, at home, at a race,
translation.zh:
在比赛过程中 比赛后
在家 在比赛中

translation.en: Seven in the morning, seven at night, whatever, and they're all clean.
translation.zh: 早上7点 晚上7点 都是没问题的

translation.en: [Fogel] He never failed a drug test.
translation.zh: 他通过了每次检测

translation.en: [man] Solemnly swear the testimony you're about to give will be the truth?
translation.zh: …庄严地发誓你的证词句句属实

translation.en: [Fogel] It was his teammates who had turned on him as part of the federal investigation.
translation.zh:
在联邦调查中
是他的队友出来指控他

translation.en: If this guy had passed, whatever it is, 500 doping tests over his entire career,
translation.zh:
不管怎样 如果这家伙通过了他整个
职业生涯中的500次兴奋剂检测

translation.en: clearly the system didn't work.
translation.zh: 明显是检测系统没有用

translation.en: How many times did you test Lance during his career?
translation.zh:
在兰斯的职业生涯中
你给他做过多少次检测？

translation.en: [Don Catlin] As the laboratory of record,
translation.zh:
（唐卡特林 加州大学洛杉矶分校
奥运实验室创始人） 根据实验室记录

translation.en: I'm estimating that I would've tested him 50 times. 5-0.
translation.zh: 我估计我给他检测过50次 50

translation.en: [Fogel] So you tested Lance 50 times and never caught him?
translation.zh:
这么说你给兰斯检测过50次
但从来没查出他有问题？

translation.en: Correct.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I developed and operated the UCLA Olympic Laboratory for 25 years.
translation.zh:
我开发并负责运营加州大学
洛杉矶分校奥运实验室25年了

translation.en: I'm known mostly for developing tests
translation.zh: 我最有名的是开发检测

translation.en: so that athletes get caught if they're using drugs.
translation.zh:
所以如果运动员服药了
会被检查出来

translation.en: [Fogel] How did you personally feel every year? Did you believe that it was just Lance?
translation.zh:
你每年的个人感觉如何？
你相信只有兰斯吗？

translation.en: -Do you think that-- -They're all doping.
translation.zh:
-你是否认为…
-他们都服用兴奋剂

translation.en: Every single one of 'em.
translation.zh: 每个都是

translation.en: Unfortunately, the drugs work. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 不幸的是 药物见效了

translation.en: With certain knowledge, you can get around the testing all the time.
translation.zh:
凭借特定的知识
你总是可以避开检测

translation.en: It's really easy to beat.
translation.zh: 这是很容易做到的事

translation.en: Very easy.
translation.zh: 非常容易

translation.en: [Fogel] Originally, the idea that I had
translation.zh: 最开始 我的想法是…

translation.en: was to prove the system in place to test athletes was bullshit.
translation.zh:
（瑞士日内瓦
2014年8月31日） …证明当前用来检测运动员的
系统完全扯淡

translation.en: I had read about the hardest amateur cycling race on the planet,
translation.zh:
我读过有关这个全球难度最大的
业余自行车赛的相关文章

translation.en: this seven-day race through the French Alps, called the Haute Route.
translation.zh:
那是七天的比赛 需要穿越
叫作高地美路的法国阿尔卑斯山脉

translation.en: If you were to take the hardest seven days in the Tour de France,
translation.zh: 如果你把环法赛最艰难的七天拿出来

translation.en: put 'em all together back-to-back-to-back-to-back,
translation.zh: 把那几天全部拼到一起

translation.en: that would be what this Haute Route course was like.
translation.zh: 那就是这条高地美路的样子

translation.en: The first year I did it totally clean.
translation.zh: 第一年参赛我绝对没服药

translation.en: There were 440 masochists.
translation.zh: 有440个受虐狂

translation.en: My goal was to be in the top 100.
translation.zh: 我的目标是冲进前100名

translation.en: After seven days, 75,000 feet of climbing and 1,000 miles...
translation.zh:
七天后 攀爬了22860米
和1609公里后…

translation.en: I was destroyed.
translation.zh: 我垮掉了

translation.en: But I finished 14th.
translation.zh: 但我最后得了第14名

translation.en: There's about ten guys, it seems,
translation.zh: 好像有十来个人

translation.en: that are on just another level than everybody else.
translation.zh: 比其他人高出一个层级

translation.en: Then there's this next group, and then there's me.
translation.zh: 然后下一组 然后到我

translation.en: [Fogel on phone] What did you think of the idea?
translation.zh: 你觉得我的想法如何？

translation.en: [Catlin] Well, in certain senses, I like the idea.
translation.zh: 从某种意义上说 我喜欢这主意

translation.en: It depends on what you consider to be dangerous...
translation.zh:
（唐卡特林通话中） 这取决于你认为自己
测试这些兴奋剂…

translation.en: [Fogel] Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Catlin] ...testing yourself on these drugs.
translation.zh: …有什么危险之处

translation.en: But I was curious, you know, how you were going to do it.
translation.zh: 但我很好奇你会怎么做

translation.en: I might be willing to help and advise and...
translation.zh: 我可能愿意帮忙和提出建议…

translation.en: avoid positives.
translation.zh: 避免阳性

translation.en: [Zabriskie] Are you gonna take drugs?
translation.zh: 你会服药吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Basically, go through...
translation.zh: 是的 基本上 通过…

translation.en: go through an entire doping program, but overseen by the scientist.
translation.zh:
通过整个兴奋剂服用计划
但要有科学家监督

translation.en: I'm gonna have Don Catlin design a program for me
translation.zh:
我要让唐卡特林专门为我
设计一个计划

translation.en: that's gonna get through every single one of the doping controls in the world...
translation.zh: 要能通过世界上的每个兴奋剂检查

translation.en: clean.
translation.zh: 平安无事

translation.en: If I could do that and I could get away with it,
translation.zh: 我要是能做到 能逃过检查

translation.en: that would mean that pretty much any athlete could do that
translation.zh: 那也就意味着任何运动员都能那样做

translation.en: and any athlete could get away with it.
translation.zh: 任何运动员都能逃过检查

translation.en: [Catlin] You're going to need a laboratory to test your body fluids.
translation.zh: 你需要一个实验室来检测你的体液

translation.en: [Fogel] I wasn't sure how I was gonna get my samples into the lab yet.
translation.zh:
我不是很确定我要怎样
把我的样本送进实验室

translation.en: The only labs that test professional athletes
translation.zh: 给职业运动员做检测的只能是

translation.en: are WADA-accredited labs.
translation.zh: WADA认证的实验室

translation.en: [Catlin] WADA is the World Anti-Doping Agency.
translation.zh: WADA就是世界反兴奋剂机构

translation.en: [Fogel] The labs are set up that you can't just go do this.
translation.zh: 这些实验室不让你随便做检测

translation.en: Because if somebody could just send their samples into a lab,
translation.zh:
（实验室道德规范） 因为如果有人能把自己的样本
送进实验室

translation.en: then anybody could figure out how to game the system.
translation.zh: 那人人都会知道怎样操纵那个系统

translation.en: And then...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: [Catlin] This could damage my reputation that I've worked on for years...
translation.zh: 这会毁掉我多年来积攒下来的声誉…

translation.en: [Fogel] He just started getting worried about his legacy.
translation.zh: 他开始为自己的名誉担心了

translation.en: [Catlin] My involvement... it's just not gonna work.
translation.zh: 我的参与…这行不通

translation.en: [Fogel] He backed out.
translation.zh: 他退出了

translation.en: But, you know, God bless Don Catlin,
translation.zh: 但是 愿上帝保佑唐卡特林

translation.en: because he told me that he knew this guy...
translation.zh: 因为他告诉我他知道这个人…

translation.en: [Catlin] The director of the Olympic lab in Moscow, Grigory Rodchenkov.
translation.zh:
莫斯科奥运实验室的主任
格里戈里罗杰琴科夫

translation.en: He's a great old friend.
translation.zh: 他是我的老朋友

translation.en: [Fogel] We talk a few times. He's in Moscow.
translation.zh: 我们聊过几次 他在莫斯科

translation.en: And that set off this whole chain of events.
translation.zh: 后来引发了这一连串事件

translation.en: [Grigory Rodchenkov] Tell something.
translation.zh: 说话吧

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Oh! Great.
translation.zh: 噢！不错

translation.en: -It's a secret window. Now it's clean. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 这是个秘密窗口 现在清晰了

translation.en: Yeah, you look good now.
translation.zh: 对 现在看起来正常了

translation.en: -Yes, you, too. Go ahead. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 对 你也是 继续吧

translation.en: I met with this guy who's gonna at least, like, prescribe me the protocol.
translation.zh:
我遇到的这个人
他最起码也要给我出个治疗方案

translation.en: What is your ultimate purpose? You would like to beat doping test?
translation.zh:
你的最终目的是什么？
你想战胜兴奋剂检测？

translation.en: You would like to start your hormonal program?
translation.zh: 你想开始你的荷尔蒙计划？

translation.en: -Yes. -Then give sample... and prove negative.
translation.zh: 是的 然后提供样本…证明是阴性

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: You need a very serious advisor because there are a lot of traps.
translation.zh:
你需要一个非常严肃的顾问
因为有很多陷阱

translation.en: -[toy squeaking] -Normally drug-- Okay.
translation.zh: 通常药物…好啦

translation.en: [in English] My dog is playing.
translation.zh: 我的狗在闹

translation.en: I just came back, and he's very much excited.
translation.zh: 我刚回来 它太兴奋了

translation.en: And he has a special toy...
translation.zh: 它有个特别的玩具…

translation.en: -[toy squeaking] -Yeah, I hear it.
translation.zh: 是 我听到了

translation.en: Hey, you wanna see my dog?
translation.zh: 你想看看我的狗吗？

translation.en: -Let me get him. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-我把它抱过来
-好

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Is it male, female?
translation.zh: 是公的还是母的？

translation.en: Male.
translation.zh: 公的

translation.en: Castrated?
translation.zh: 阉割了吗？

translation.en: No. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] So with balls?
translation.zh: 所以还有蛋蛋？

translation.en: He's got the balls.
translation.zh: 它有蛋蛋

translation.en: Yeah. There is the balls. Yes, yes.
translation.zh: 对 有蛋蛋 是的

translation.en: -Yeah, this is Max. -[Rodchenkov] Max.
translation.zh: 对 这是麦克斯 麦克斯

translation.en: Max. Yeah.
translation.zh: 麦克斯 好

translation.en: Testosterone, you have to have a prescription.
translation.zh: 睾丸酮 你必须有处方

translation.en: Yes, uh, injectable.
translation.zh: 对 要注射剂

translation.en: Injectable, right.
translation.zh: 注射剂 对

translation.en: So, now you are clever, huh?
translation.zh: 看来你现在变聪明了哈？

translation.en: Like Lance Armstrong.
translation.zh: 像兰斯阿姆斯特朗

translation.en: Send it to me.
translation.zh: 把信息发给我

translation.en: Names, doses, for how long...
translation.zh: 名字、剂量、多长时间…

translation.en: So everything should be orchestrated.
translation.zh: 所有东西都要精心安排

translation.en: [Fogel] How do I do that? Just send you everything I'm gonna take?
translation.zh:
我要怎么做？
就把我要服用的东西都发给你？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Yes, your one-month schedule. Yes.
translation.zh: 对 你一个月的日程安排

translation.en: We've got three medications that you'll take by injection.
translation.zh: 我们有三种药让你注射 （斯科特A勃兰特 医学博士）

translation.en: -This is five times a week? -Yeah, it's all on your regimen sheet.
translation.zh:
-这是一周五次？
-对 都在你的用药方案表里了

translation.en: We'll draw up half a cc.
translation.zh: 我们抽取半CC

translation.en: -Looks like a big needle. -It's a tiny needle.
translation.zh:
-这针头好像很大
-这是小针

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-对

translation.en: Your testosterone comes ready to go. This is very, very viscous.
translation.zh:
你的睾丸酮准备好了
这是非常粘稠的

translation.en: It's a very thick substance, so you need a big needle to draw it up.
translation.zh:
是一种很浓的物质
所以必须用大针头抽取

translation.en: Then we're gonna pull out.
translation.zh: 然后把它抽出来

translation.en: So there's your .2 cc's.
translation.zh: 这是0.2CC

translation.en: And that one goes also in the top of your thigh.
translation.zh: 这个也从你的大腿上方注射

translation.en: -I'm a little nervous, but all right. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我有点紧张 但没事
-好吧

translation.en: [Scott Brandt] Give me a thigh.
translation.zh: 把大腿露出来

translation.en: And does it hurt the muscle? Do you flex?
translation.zh: 肌肉会疼吗？肌肉会收缩吗？

translation.en: [Brandt] It's not gonna go in your muscle. It's gonna go above.
translation.zh: 不会到肌肉里面 只在肌肉上面

translation.en: You just pinch it, and we're just gonna go just through the skin.

translation.en: [Fogel] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Be very careful with all your material. -People are very sensitive also, you know. -[Fogel] Yes.
translation.zh:
你带的东西都要小心点
人们是非常敏感的

translation.en: This is my director place.
translation.zh: 这就是主任办公室

translation.en: It's the most famous laboratory in the world.
translation.zh: 这是全世界最著名的实验室

translation.en: We cannot say explicitly that you have been analyzed.
translation.zh:
我们不能明确地说
你已经被分析过了

translation.en: It's coming. I already solved everything yesterday.
translation.zh: 来了 昨天我已经把一切都解决了

translation.en: You will have it until, let's say... Within two weeks, we will do this.
translation.zh:
差不多两星期内你就会拿到结果
我们会处理

translation.en: But it should be done still, say, under the table, not...
translation.zh: 但还是应该不要到明面上 不要…

translation.en: -[Fogel] Okay. -Okay. [clears throat]
translation.zh:
-好
-好

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Smile. Your race is over. We have to go downstairs.
translation.zh:
布莱恩 笑笑 比赛结束了
我们得下楼了

translation.en: [Fogel] Are there scientists, or those working in WADA laboratories today,
translation.zh: 今天在WADA实验室工作的科学家

translation.en: that you suspect could have been corrupted?
translation.zh: 你有没有怀疑谁已经腐败了？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Each director of laboratory, like me... I have to sign a code of ethics,
translation.zh:
每个实验室的主任 比如我
都必须签署道德准则

translation.en: that what we are doing is not harmful or detrimental
translation.zh:
保证我们做的事
对整个反兴奋剂的社会

translation.en: to the whole anti-doping society.
translation.zh: 没有危害或没有不利之处

translation.en: We go down this emergency exit.
translation.zh: 我们从这个应急出口下去

translation.en: [Fogel] What did Russia have to do
translation.zh:
俄罗斯跟隐藏所有运动员的
生物护照

translation.en: with the hiding blood passports of all the athletes?
translation.zh: 有什么关系？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Let's talk in my office.
translation.zh: 去我办公室谈吧

translation.en: If you hide fight against doping, you cannot be 50% honest.
translation.zh:
如果不公开反对兴奋剂
则无法做到50%的诚实

translation.en: You have to be honest, or you have to hide the ends.
translation.zh:
你必须诚实
否则你必须隐藏最终目标

translation.en: It's the same as Orwell, 1984.
translation.zh: 就像奥威尔的《1984》

translation.en: WADA is like a religion, and you cannot escape.
translation.zh: WADA就像一种宗教 你无法逃脱

translation.en: You have to think about money, but you cannot steal money.
translation.zh: 你必须想着钱 但不能偷钱

translation.en: You have to think about women,
translation.zh: 你必须想着女人

translation.en: but you have to be married and don't go to prostitution.
translation.zh: 但你必须结婚 而不是去嫖妓

translation.en: But again...
translation.zh: 但话又说回来

translation.en: almost everybody has some period when they were sinners.
translation.zh: 几乎每个人都有罪恶的阶段

translation.en: So what to do?
translation.zh: 那怎么办呢？

translation.en: There is no answer.
translation.zh: 没有答案

translation.en: [Fogel] For the last five months, I took urine and then I did blood--
translation.zh:
最近五个月以来
我取了尿样 取了血样…

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Yes, we have a good database.
translation.zh: 对 我们有个很好的数据库

translation.en: How do we go about the analysis? What do we wanna show?
translation.zh: 分析怎么办？我们想展示什么？

translation.en: How do we put together
translation.zh: 我们要如何整合更大的故事框架？

translation.en: -the bigger story arc? -Bryan, be optimistic.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 乐观点

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Smile.
translation.zh: 笑笑

translation.en: I have vodka for you.
translation.zh: 我给你准备了伏特加

translation.en: -You do? -Yes.
translation.zh: 真的？ 是的

translation.en: -The best vodka. -What kind?
translation.zh: 最棒的伏特加 哪一种？

translation.en: From Mordovia.
translation.zh: 从莫尔多维亚来的

translation.en: -Oh, awesome! -You do drink vodka?
translation.zh:
-真棒！
-你真的喝伏特加？

translation.en: -Yeah, I like vodka. -You like-- I have vodka for you.
translation.zh:
-真的 我喜欢伏特加
-我给你准备了伏特加

translation.en: I've decided I'm not gonna leave Russia. I'm gonna stay here.
translation.zh:
我已经决定不离开俄罗斯了
我要留下来

translation.en: You would like to stay?
translation.zh: 你想留在俄罗斯？

translation.en: Russia is the most relaxing country in the world.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯是全世界最轻松的国家

translation.en: You think?
translation.zh: 你觉得？

translation.en: -No. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: [Fogel] You having fun?
translation.zh: 你们开心吗？

translation.en: Yes, we have fun!
translation.zh: 对 我们开心！

translation.en: Smile.
translation.zh: 笑一笑

translation.en: Bryan!
translation.zh: 布莱恩！

translation.en: [man] Ladies and gentlemen, members of the media, welcome to Geneva.
translation.zh:
女士们 先生们
媒体朋友们 欢迎来到日内瓦

translation.en: Almost a year ago, very serious doping allegations
translation.zh: 大约一年前 德国电视频道ARD

translation.en: were first raised on German television channel ARD.
translation.zh: 首先提出了非常严重的兴奋剂指控

translation.en: The WADA president, Sir Craig Reedie,
translation.zh: WADA主席克雷格雷迪先生

translation.en: announced that a full and thorough inquiry would be conducted.
translation.zh: 宣布即将开展全面彻底的调查

translation.en: The founding president of the World Anti-Doping Agency,
translation.zh: 世界反兴奋剂机构的创始人兼主席

translation.en: Mr. Dick Pound, the chair of that commission.
translation.zh: 调查委员会主席迪克庞德先生

translation.en: Overwhelming portions of the allegations made on the ARD program
translation.zh: ARD节目中提出的大量指控

translation.en: have been found by the Independent Commission to be true.
translation.zh: 经独立调查委员会证实是真的

translation.en: It's worse than we thought. We have found cover-ups.
translation.zh:
情况比我们想象中糟糕
我们发现有人瞒天过海

translation.en: We found destruction of samples in the laboratories.
translation.zh: 我们发现实验室里的样本被破坏

translation.en: We found payments of money in order to conceal doping tests...
translation.zh:
除此之外 我们还发现有人出钱贿赂
来隐瞒兴奋剂检测

translation.en: among others.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Our conclusion was that all of this could not have happened,
translation.zh: 我们的结论是如果国家权威部门

translation.en: and continue to happen, without the knowledge of
translation.zh: 不知情或者没有明示或暗示的同意

translation.en: and either actual or implied consent of the state authorities.
translation.zh: 不知情或者没有明示或暗示的同意 这种情况绝不可能发生并继续滋长

translation.en: [Fogel] You reading this?
translation.zh: 你看过这个了吗？

translation.en: Forty pages of this report is Grigory.
translation.zh: 这份40页的报告都在针对格里戈里

translation.en: It's hard to imagine
translation.zh: 很难想象

translation.en: what the Russian state interest in athletes' urine would be.
translation.zh:
俄罗斯这个国家为何
会对运动员的尿液感兴趣

translation.en: One of our big concerns about tests were the 1,400 that were destroyed
translation.zh: 我们最大的担心是1400份检测

translation.en: by the director of the Moscow laboratory.
translation.zh: 已经被莫斯科实验室的主任毁坏

translation.en: In fact, our recommendation is the director of the laboratory
translation.zh:
事实上 我们建议是
撤掉该实验室的主任

translation.en: be removed from his position, that the WADA accreditation be withdrawn,
translation.zh: 并撤销WADA认证

translation.en: and the Russian Federation be suspended.
translation.zh: 同时让俄罗斯田径协会禁赛

translation.en: -[Veronika] Bryan, hi. -[Fogel] Hi.
translation.zh:
-布莱恩 嗨
-嗨

translation.en: Where did Grigory go?
translation.zh: 格里戈里去哪了？

translation.en: I've been crying.
translation.zh: 我一直在哭

translation.en: Yes, I am with him,
translation.zh: 对 我跟他在一起

translation.en: and I think maybe you want to speak with him.
translation.zh: 我想你可能想跟他说话

translation.en: Maybe he's a little bit nervous.
translation.zh: 或许他有点紧张

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -[Rodchenkov] Bryan.
translation.zh:
-很抱歉
-布莱恩

translation.en: I'm not-- I'm sorry. I'm trying to understand what you're saying.
translation.zh:
我不是…抱歉
我在尝试理解你说的话

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] I'm absolutely saying that we will overturn all this bullshit,
translation.zh: 我说的就是我们要推翻这个烂摊子

translation.en: and it will be upside down.
translation.zh: 让它天翻地覆

translation.en: So, Bryan, I hardly could talk to you tonight.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 我今晚很难跟你说上话了

translation.en: [woman] The details are damning
translation.zh: 各种细节已经确凿

translation.en: and could have a profound impact on the future of Russian athletics.
translation.zh:
可能会对俄罗斯体育界的未来
产生深远的影响

translation.en: [man] This WADA commission has accused Russian athletics
translation.zh:
WADA独立调查委员会
指控俄罗斯体育界

translation.en: of state-sponsored doping.
translation.zh: 在国家支持下滥用兴奋剂

translation.en: [in Russian] We are preparing our response to again provide any explanation needed.
translation.zh:
（尼基塔卡马耶夫
俄罗斯反兴奋剂机构执行主任） 我们正在准备回应
以便再次提供必要的解释

translation.en: That's all I can say at this point.
translation.zh: 目前我能说的就这么多

translation.en: Does this mean they could potentially miss next year's Olympics?
translation.zh:
这是否意味着他们可能错过
明年的奥运会？

translation.en: Well, that is certainly one of the potential outcomes here.
translation.zh: 这肯定是潜在的后果之一

translation.en: [man] The International Olympic Committee have released a statement.
translation.zh: 国际奥林匹克委员会已经发表声明

translation.en: You will see athletes being sanctioned by the IAAF.
translation.zh:
你会看到有运动员
受到国际田径联合会的制裁 （托马斯巴赫
国际奥委会主席）

translation.en: You will see athletes and officials being excluded.
translation.zh:
（托马斯巴赫
国际奥委会主席） 你会看到有的运动员和官员
被排除在外

translation.en: And you will see an action led by the IOC.
translation.zh: 你会看到国际奥委会领导的行动

translation.en: We'll apply this zero-tolerance policy.
translation.zh: 我们会采取零容忍政策

translation.en: [man] Decision time for the IAAF
translation.zh:
国际田径联合会
针对俄罗斯田径运动员

translation.en: on whether Russia's track and field athletes
translation.zh: 是否有资格参加里约奥运会

translation.en: will be allowed to compete at the Rio Olympics.
translation.zh:
决断时间 （塞巴斯蒂安科
国际田径联合会主席）

translation.en: I want to hear what the Athletics Federation of Russia
translation.zh:
（塞巴斯蒂安科
国际田径联合会主席） 我想听听俄罗斯田径协会

translation.en: is actually saying in answer to those allegations.
translation.zh: 如何回应那些指控

translation.en: [man] The Sports Minister, Vitaly Mutko, has said,
translation.zh:
俄罗斯体育部部长
维塔利姆特科说过

translation.en: "Russia took all the necessary measures," he says, "to fight the doping problem.
translation.zh:
“俄罗斯采取了所有必要措施
来打击兴奋剂问题

translation.en: Moscow's anti-doping lab
translation.zh: 莫斯科反兴奋剂实验室

translation.en: was recently recognized as one of the best in the world."
translation.zh:
最近被公认为是全世界
最出色的实验室之一”

translation.en: You don't want to talk to us?
translation.zh: 你不想跟我们谈？

translation.en: Well, the employees at this lab are clearly being very tight-lipped,
translation.zh: （CNN探访俄罗斯秘密实验室） 这个实验室的雇员都守口如瓶

translation.en: but the report from the World Anti-Doping Agency
translation.zh: 但世界反兴奋剂机构的报告

translation.en: goes into great detail
translation.zh: 已经深入细节

translation.en: describing the alleged activities inside that building.
translation.zh:
描述了那栋大楼内部
被指控的种种行为

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] There are around 50 correspondents behind my fence, but I am here.
translation.zh:
大约有50名记者
堵在我家栅栏外 但我在这里

translation.en: And I am not supposed to talk.
translation.zh: 我本不应该说话

translation.en: Bryan, stay quiet.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 别说话

translation.en: You're a lucky man. Only you, knowing me.
translation.zh: 你很幸运 只有你 懂我

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 老天

translation.zh:
如今 世界反兴奋剂机构 暂停了俄罗斯体育界的
兴奋剂检测实验室

translation.en: and the head of the lab resigned.
translation.zh: 实验室主任已辞职

translation.en: [Veronika in Russian] Grisha, be careful what you tell him now.
translation.zh: 格里沙 你现在跟他说话小心点

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Don't tell me. I am just--
translation.zh: 别跟我说 我只是…

translation.en: [Veronika] They're holding on the phone for you.
translation.zh: 他们等着你讲电话

translation.en: -[Rodchenkov] Tell them I'll call back-- -[Veronika] It sounds serious.
translation.zh:
-告诉他们我待会儿回电话…
-听口气事情还挺严重

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] I'll call back in five minutes!
translation.zh: 我五分钟后回电话！

translation.en: -[Veronika] Okay, but will you? -[Rodchenkov] Yes, go away!
translation.zh:
-好 但你会回吗？
-会 走开！

translation.en: [Veronika] Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Bryan...
translation.zh: 布莱恩…

translation.en: [in English] It's a disaster.
translation.zh: 真是灾难

translation.en: They're just killing people.
translation.zh: 他们简直是杀人

translation.en: Cutting heads, you know, without who is guilty.
translation.zh: 杀头 没人犯罪啊

translation.en: Yesterday, you know, I went to Minister Mutko,
translation.zh: 昨天 我去见了姆特科部长

translation.en: and we started to discuss.
translation.zh: 我们开始讨论

translation.en: He was talking, blah, blah, blah, about football.
translation.zh: 他说了一通橄榄球

translation.en: Uh, blah, blah, blah, about Formula 1.
translation.zh: 他说了一通橄榄球 说了一通一级方程式赛车

translation.en: Then to say what to do with bloody doping.
translation.zh: 然后才说兴奋剂的事怎么办

translation.en: But he say, "Could you resign?" I go, "Yes."
translation.zh:
但他说：“你可以辞职吗？”
我说：“行”

translation.en: "Today?" "Yes, today."
translation.zh: “今天？” “对 今天”

translation.en: And I resigned.
translation.zh: 于是我就辞职了

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: they lost director.
translation.zh: 他们没了主任

translation.en: I have a lot of calls, but I'm just changing my telephones.
translation.zh:
我接到很多电话
但我只是把电话换了

translation.en: People are looking for their job, but laboratory is almost empty.
translation.zh: 大家都在找工作 但实验室几乎空了

translation.en: Empty.
translation.zh: 空的

translation.en: I don't know what's going on.
translation.zh: 我不知道这是什么情况

translation.en: I just know what I'm reading in the newspaper and in the press and... You know.
translation.zh: 我只知道我在报纸和媒体中读到的…

translation.en: Oh, really? Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: I mean, will they come after you?
translation.zh: 他们会抓捕你吗？

translation.en: Are they gonna arrest you? Are they gonna...
translation.zh: 他们会逮捕你吗？会不会…

translation.en: Would they try to put you in jail?
translation.zh: 他们会把你送进监狱吗？

translation.en: In jail? No.
translation.zh: 进监狱？不会

translation.en: What is the reason for jail?
translation.zh: 为什么要送我进监狱？

translation.en: -You know. -No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: Are you in any danger?
translation.zh: 你有危险吗？

translation.en: Yes, but not jail. It could be some... I don't know.
translation.zh:
有 但不会进监狱
可能会…我也不知道

translation.en: -I mean-- -Do you know that I am now moving with a security man?
translation.zh: 你知道我现在去哪都带着保安吗？

translation.en: Security guard.
translation.zh: 保安

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: Just a security guard in my home.
translation.zh: 我家里就有一个保安

translation.en: -In your home? -Coming to my car.
translation.zh:
-在你家里？
-到我车里来

translation.en: I'm following behind.
translation.zh: 我会跟在后面

translation.en: It's recommended until the end of the week,
translation.zh: 建议到这个周末

translation.en: because I am the only man who can kill both sides.
translation.zh: 因为我是唯一能让双方抓狂的人

translation.en: Russia and WADA, so...
translation.zh: 俄罗斯和WADA 所以…

translation.en: Stay quiet.
translation.zh: 别出声

translation.en: [Vitaly Mutko in Russian] Let me say this.
translation.zh: 让我说句话

translation.en: In reality, the Independent Commission's report
translation.zh: 事实上 独立调查委员会的报告…

translation.en: and statements made by Mr. Pound are exaggerated.
translation.zh: （维塔利姆特科 体育部长） …和庞德先生的声明都过于夸大事实

translation.en: We've even built a modern, state-of-the-art anti-doping laboratory
translation.zh:
我们已经建立了一个最先进的
现代反兴奋剂实验室

translation.en: that is renowned for its testing
translation.zh: 因为为奥运会、残奥会、锦标赛等

translation.en: for the Olympics, Paralympics, championships and more,
translation.zh: 执行检测而享誉世界

translation.en: and received the highest merits for its contributions.
translation.zh:
因为其贡献
该实验室获得了最高成就

translation.en: The government is merely financing the laboratory operation.
translation.zh: 政府只是为实验室的运营提供资金

translation.en: [Rodchenkov in English] They don't accept this Independent Commission at all.
translation.zh: 他们根本不接受独立调查委员会

translation.en: They're deliberately lying.
translation.zh: 他们故意撒谎

translation.en: Bryan, Bryan...
translation.zh: 布莱恩…

translation.en: -look at me. -[Fogel] Okay.
translation.zh: 看着我

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] It means I could be tossed under the bus anytime.
translation.zh: 我随时可能成为替罪羊

translation.en: I'm not sure that we are connecting freely.
translation.zh: 我不确定我们能自由地联系

translation.en: Because now we are on radar, that's for sure.
translation.zh:
但现在我们被监视着
这是肯定的

translation.en: You know Snowden?
translation.zh: 你知道斯诺登吗？

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 当然知道

translation.en: Now you see. [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 现在你明白了

translation.en: We still don't know... We still don't know
translation.zh: 我们还不知道…

translation.en: whether Russia is participating in Olympic Games or not.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯是否能参加奥运会

translation.en: The outcome, why I am very much cautious about my life...
translation.zh: 结果 我生活中为什么非常谨慎…

translation.en: If me will be purged...
translation.zh: 如果我被铲除了

translation.en: okay, Russia will go to the Olympics.
translation.zh: 好 那俄罗斯会参加奥运会

translation.en: [clicking tongue] The problem is to survive.
translation.zh: 问题是要活下去

translation.en: -Listen, I, uh... -Yes.
translation.zh:
-听我说 我…
-好

translation.en: -Joking, you know, seriousness aside... -Stop it. Stop, stop.
translation.zh: 开玩笑… 别说了

translation.en: I'm just... I'm worried about you.
translation.zh: 我只是…担心你

translation.en: Yes, yes.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Tomorrow, I drop you.
translation.zh: 明天 我就不跟你联系了

translation.en: And then, when I say... [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 然后 等我说

translation.en: "How is weather in Los Angeles?" or anything related to weather...
translation.zh:
“洛杉矶的天气怎么样？”
或者任何有关天气的话时

translation.en: it means that we will talk in 15, 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 就代表我们15或20分钟后聊

translation.en: Be ready to talk.
translation.zh: 准备聊天

translation.en: [Sebastian Coe] Tonight, our sport finds itself in a shameful situation.
translation.zh:
（2015年11月13日） 今晚我们的体育界
陷入了非常不体面的境况

translation.en: And that is why I can confirm the council has overwhelmingly voted,
translation.zh:
（塞巴斯蒂安科
国际田径联合会主席） 所以我可以确定
委员会已经进行了压倒性的投票

translation.en: with immediate effect, to suspend the Russian Federation.
translation.zh:
直接的结果就是
让俄罗斯联合会禁赛…

translation.en: It's done so, uh, by 22 votes to one.
translation.zh: （国际田径赛主管部门） （国际田径联合会）

translation.en: It is the strongest sanction... [continues indistinctly]
translation.zh:
（国际田径联合会） （投票让俄罗斯田径协会禁赛） （禁止参加任何比赛
包括里约奥运会）

translation.en: [in Russian] Regarding the recent events
translation.zh: 鉴于近期发生的

translation.en: connected to our track and field team,
translation.zh: 与田径队相关的事件

translation.en: I urge the sports minister and all my sports colleagues
translation.zh:
我强烈要求体育部部长
和所有体育部的同事

translation.en: to make this their number one priority.
translation.zh: 解决这个当务之急

translation.en: This is the first step.
translation.zh: 这是第一步

translation.en: Secondly, it is vital to conduct our own internal investigation.
translation.zh:
第二步 我们自己要开展内部调查
这一步非常重要

translation.en: [clears throat] Sport should be fair.
translation.zh: 体育应该讲究公平

translation.en: Responsibility should be personalized and absolute.
translation.zh: 责任应当个人化和绝对化

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Bryan...
translation.zh: 布莱恩…

translation.en: I need... Wait, look at me.
translation.zh: 我需要…等等 看着我

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I need to escape and to walk... to walk...
translation.zh: 我必须逃出去 然后走…

translation.en: You can go wherever you want.
translation.zh: 你想去哪都可以

translation.en: -Okay. -I will be doggy-sitting at your home.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会帮你家看狗

translation.en: So you wanna get out?
translation.zh: 所以你想出来？

translation.en: Yes. Simply.
translation.zh: 是的 就想出去

translation.en: What do you want to, uh...
translation.zh: 你想怎么…

translation.en: It's very suspicious when you have one-way ticket, you know.
translation.zh: 你拿的是单程票时 就会非常可疑

translation.en: Yeah, right. You have to book a round trip.
translation.zh: 对 你必须订往返票

translation.en: [Veronika in Russian] They're watching us.
translation.zh: 他们这会儿监视着我们呢

translation.en: -[Rodchenkov] Bryan? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 布莱恩？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] What I am doing, myself, I can do nothing.
translation.zh: 我在做的 我自己 什么也做不了

translation.en: -So... -Okay?
translation.zh:
-那…
-好吗？

translation.en: I'll send you... Let me figure out some flight options, okay?
translation.zh: 我会给你发…我看看航班 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Fogel] I'm gonna get the flight, right now.
translation.zh: 我把航班信息给你 马上

translation.en: -[Rodchenkov] Yes, right now. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好 马上

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Go.
translation.zh: 你查吧

translation.en: Also, some security measures will be set.
translation.zh: 另外 必须有安保措施

translation.en: [Fogel] How will I know that you made it through okay?
translation.zh: 我要怎么知道你平安无事？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [both] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -[Rodchenkov] Bryan? -Yeah, I'm right here.
translation.zh:
-布莱恩？
-在 我在呢

translation.en: -Okay, just left my security man. -[Fogel] Okay.
translation.zh:
-好 刚离开我的保安
-好

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] I am very much dizzy, paranoid.
translation.zh: 我现在头晕脑胀的 好像得了妄想症

translation.en: [Fogel] We'll get you here.
translation.zh: 我们会把你接过来

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] My wife and children decided maybe it's better to stay in Russia.
translation.zh:
我妻子和我的孩子们
决定他们最好还是待在俄罗斯

translation.en: [Fogel] Just gotta make sure in the US that you're okay also.
translation.zh: 你得保证 在美国你也没事

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] My daughter...
translation.zh: 我女儿…

translation.en: [Fogel] Yes?
translation.zh: 怎么？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] She's getting married.
translation.zh: 她要结婚了

translation.en: [Fogel] Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Married, everything.
translation.zh: 结婚 之类的

translation.en: It's time.
translation.zh: 是时候了

translation.en: [Fogel] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -[Rodchenkov] Cross fingers now. -[Fogel] You, too.
translation.zh:
-自求多福吧
-你也是

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Remember Orwell.
translation.zh: 记住奥威尔

translation.en: "We will meet each other where there is no darkness."
translation.zh:
“我们会在没有黑暗的地方
遇见彼此”

translation.en: [Fogel] When I first interviewed you a year ago,
translation.zh: 一年前我第一次访问你时

translation.en: I asked you if you thought your investigation
translation.zh: 我问你是否觉得你的调查

translation.en: would be a defining moment in the history of sport.
translation.zh: 会成为体育史上的一个决定性时刻

translation.en: How would you answer that question now?
translation.zh: 你现在会如何回答那个问题？

translation.en: Yes, it can be a defining moment, and I think it should.
translation.zh: 对 是决定性的时刻 我认为应该是

translation.en: You've got your number one Olympic sport in the crosshairs,
translation.zh: （理查德“迪克”庞德） 第一大奥运会项目成了众矢之的

translation.en: and you've got one of the major Olympic countries in the world
translation.zh: 全世界的奥运强国之一成了

translation.en: in the crosshairs,
translation.zh: 众矢之的

translation.en: even if it's the crosshairs only on athletics at the moment.
translation.zh: 尽管目标只对准当时的田径运动

translation.en: That has the potential of affecting the credibility of all sport
translation.zh: 那对所有项目的可信度都会产生影响

translation.en: and, therefore, the continued viability of all sport.
translation.zh: 进而会影响所有项目的可行性

translation.en: Why would I watch an event that's fixed?
translation.zh:
我为什么会看一个
作弊的比赛？

translation.en: [Fogel] There he is.
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: -I'm here, yes! -He's escaped.
translation.zh:
-我来了 是的！
-他逃出来了

translation.en: -This is-- Yes. Escaped alive. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 这是…对 活着逃出来了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: [Fogel] Then you did what?
translation.zh: 然后你怎么做？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Destroyed my computer from my working place.
translation.zh: 毁了我办公处的电脑

translation.en: I took hard disk. And also, I have three copies.
translation.zh: 我把硬盘拿走了 还做了三份拷贝

translation.en: It's a historical moment.
translation.zh: 那是历史性的一刻

translation.en: [Dan Cogan on phone] Grigory, I want you to know
translation.zh:
格里戈里 我想让你知道
我明白你想见光的意愿…

translation.en: that I understand your desire to be visible
translation.zh:
格里戈里 我想让你知道
我明白你想见光的意愿… （达恩科根-制片人
通话中）

translation.en: and I think that's very important for you, to be safe.
translation.zh:
（达恩科根-制片人
通话中） …我认为安全对你非常重要

translation.en: I was on the phone yesterday with the lawyer for Edward Snowden.
translation.zh:
我昨天跟爱德华斯诺登的律师
通过电话

translation.en: They have some recommendations.
translation.zh: 他们有些建议

translation.en: I have everything with me, and also I destroyed my office computer.
translation.zh:
我把东西都带出来了
我还毁了办公室的电脑

translation.en: Put it in a very safe place and dropped there like a dummy.
translation.zh:
把它放到非常安全的地方
放了一台假的在办公室

translation.en: [Cogan] We'll talk in a few hours.
translation.zh: 我们过几个小时再聊吧

translation.en: -[Fogel] This is, uh... This is it. -[Rodchenkov] Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 这里…就是这里

translation.en: It's like a labyrinth.
translation.zh: 像个迷宫

translation.en: [Fogel] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Okay, this is the place.
translation.zh: 好 就是这里

translation.en: -[Rodchenkov] Good. -Here's, um...
translation.zh:
-好
-这是…

translation.en: bed, bathroom.
translation.zh: 床 洗手间

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Secure place.
translation.zh: 很安全

translation.en: It's a good thing.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: [Fogel] This'll work, at least till we get what the plan is
translation.zh:
暂且如此 至少等我们知道
计划是什么

translation.en: and what we're gonna do.
translation.zh: 接下来要干什么

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] He goes to me. He remembers me since May.
translation.zh:
它朝我走来了
从五月份开始它就记得我

translation.en: You will be learning Russian.
translation.zh: 你会学习俄语

translation.en: You will be learning Russian very soon.
translation.zh: 你很快就能学会俄语

translation.en: I'm missing dogs.
translation.zh: 我想我的狗狗们了

translation.en: There was one thing that I noticed in the IC report,
translation.zh:
我注意到独立调查委员会的报告中
提到一件事

translation.en: and that was that there were KGB people hanging around the lab.
translation.zh: 有克格勃的人在实验室附近徘徊

translation.en: And that's a real no-no.
translation.zh: 那是绝对不可接受的

translation.en: You know, KGB people are not nice people.
translation.zh: 克格勃的人并不友好

translation.en: So I am at home.
translation.zh: 我到家了

translation.en: [interpreter] We will banish all those who have a suspicious reputation
translation.zh: 我们会将声誉可疑的所有人

translation.en: from the leadership of Russian athletics.
translation.zh: 从俄罗斯田径的领导层中开除

translation.en: In 60 days, we will present the renewed athletics with new people...
translation.zh:
60天后 我们将呈现
全新的田径队和新的人…

translation.en: [Fogel] So, if the KGB... I guess they're called the FSB now...
translation.zh:
如果克格勃…我想现在应该叫
俄罗斯联邦安全局…

translation.en: they're in the lab,
translation.zh: 如果他们在实验室

translation.en: who else could finance them but Vitaly Mutko?
translation.zh:
除了维塔利姆特科
谁还可能资助他们呢？

translation.en: Oh, I don't think Vitaly Mutko finances the FSB.
translation.zh:
我不认为是维塔利姆特科
资助俄罗斯联邦安全局

translation.en: -That's a state security operation. -But... but Putin?
translation.zh:
-那是国家安全部门
-但是… 但是普京？

translation.en: Well, whoever finances it and runs the state security apparatus,
translation.zh: 不管是谁资助和运行国家安全机构

translation.en: it's not the sport minister.
translation.zh: 都不可能是体育部长

translation.en: [man] Officials are essentially saying, "There may be some problems,
translation.zh: 官员们说：“可能有些问题

translation.en: but we are trying and have already taken steps
translation.zh: 但我们正在尝试或已经采取措施

translation.en: to address those problems."
translation.zh: 解决那些问题”

translation.en: And all of the officials are essentially rejecting the idea
translation.zh: 所有官员基本上都否定

translation.en: that there's still a major problem.
translation.zh: 存在重大问题这种说法

translation.en: [in Russian] Honey, hi.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 嗨

translation.en: I am here, far away and in the darkness.
translation.zh: 我在很远的地方 在黑暗中

translation.en: You see them all?
translation.zh: 你看到他们了吗？

translation.en: Wearing fancy suits, ties, making speeches on TV...
translation.zh:
穿戴着名牌服装 领带
在电视上演讲…

translation.en: It's all a farce.
translation.zh: 就是个闹剧

translation.en: [in English] Of course I was very disappointed when laboratory was closed.
translation.zh: 当然 实验室关闭时 我非常失望

translation.en: Now reading this IC report, I am just watching with another's eyes.
translation.zh:
现在读这个独立调查委员会报告
我是以另一个人的眼光来看的

translation.en: I know that I could change the past, telling the truth.
translation.zh: 我知道我能够改变过去 说出真相

translation.en: But would you like telling the truth, you will be annihilated.
translation.zh: 你一旦讲真相 就会被人灭掉

translation.en: George Orwell, I was reading the first in 1989.
translation.zh: 1989年我第一次读乔治奥威尔

translation.en: I was 30.
translation.zh: 那年我30岁

translation.en: Before that time, in Soviet Union,
translation.zh: 在那之前 在苏联时期

translation.en: the book 1984, it was strictly, strictly prohibited.
translation.zh: 《1984》这本书是被严格禁止的

translation.en: For me, it was totally shocking.
translation.zh: 在我看来 这本书非常震惊

translation.en: Especially "ignorance is strength."
translation.zh: （战争即和平 自由即奴役） 尤其是“无知即力量”

translation.en: This is the most powerful thing.
translation.zh: 这是最有力量的话语

translation.en: It was my weapon.
translation.zh: 是我的武器

translation.en: It gave me definitions, it gave me coordinates
translation.zh: 它给了我定义 给了我坐标

translation.en: how you can apply to your life.
translation.zh: 让我知道如何应用到人生中

translation.en: It's like a road map.
translation.zh: 它就像一幅路线图

translation.en: "'There are three stages in your reintegration,' said O'Brien.
translation.zh:
“重新整合分为三个阶段”
奥布莱恩说

translation.en: 'There is learning, there is understanding,
translation.zh: “学习 理解

translation.en: and there is acceptance.
translation.zh: 接纳

translation.en: It's time for you to enter upon the first stage.'"
translation.zh: 现在你是时候进入第一阶段了”

translation.en: I was thinking that we'd start...
translation.zh: 我认为我们可以开始…

translation.en: I ask you questions, and you answer "yes" or "no."
translation.zh: 我问你问题 你回答“是”或“否”

translation.en: Does Russia have a systematic, statewide doping system in place
translation.zh:
俄罗斯是否有系统的
全国性滥用兴奋剂系统

translation.en: to cheat the Olympics?
translation.zh: 在奥运会上作弊？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: Were you the mastermind of a statewide system that cheated the Olympics?
translation.zh:
你是不是在奥运会上作弊的
全国系统的主谋？

translation.en: Of course. Yes.
translation.zh: 当然 是

translation.en: Russia won a total of 73 medals in the 2008 Beijing Olympics.
translation.zh:
2008年的北京奥运会上
俄罗斯共赢得73枚奖牌

translation.en: How many of those athletes were dirty?
translation.zh: 有多少名运动员沾染了兴奋剂？

translation.en: Thirty.
translation.zh: 三十名

translation.en: Russia won 81 total medals in London. How many of those were dirty?
translation.zh:
俄罗斯在伦敦奥运会上赢得
81枚奖牌 有多少人沾染兴奋剂？

translation.en: Oh, even more.
translation.zh: 噢 甚至更多

translation.en: 50% is for sure. Let it be 50%.
translation.zh: 肯定有50% 就算50%吧

translation.en: They were earned using special program.
translation.zh: 那些奖牌是通过特殊计划获得了

translation.en: State-sponsored, of course.
translation.zh: 当然是国家赞助的

translation.en: Was Putin aware of the existence of a Russian doping system?
translation.zh:
普京知道俄罗斯
兴奋剂系统的存在吗？

translation.en: Yes. Aware of my name.
translation.zh: 知道 知道我的名字

translation.en: He took me from the prison for such special affair.
translation.zh:
他为这件特殊的事情
把我从监狱放出来

translation.en: -From prison? -Yes.
translation.zh: 从监狱？ 对

translation.en: To redeem.
translation.zh: 让我将功赎罪

translation.en: Okay, let's back up one sec here.
translation.zh: 好 我们从这倒退一秒

translation.en: My concern is that it's something they would use to discredit you.
translation.zh:
我担心的是他们会抓住这个把柄
来败坏你的名声

translation.en: Oh, of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: So, the first criminal investigation against you,
translation.zh: 所以 第一次针对你的犯罪调查

translation.en: when was it and what happened?
translation.zh: 是什么时候 发生了什么？

translation.en: Oh, it's not easy to say how it happened.
translation.zh: 很难说是如何发生的

translation.en: Before 2008, China was the biggest producer of anabolics.
translation.zh:
在2008年之前 中国是最大的
合成类固醇生产国

translation.en: It was produced in a pharmaceutical,
translation.zh: 在制药厂里生产

translation.en: well-equipped, good manufacturing practice.
translation.zh: 设备精良 生产水平非常成熟

translation.en: No contamination, high qualities.
translation.zh: 无污染 品质高

translation.en: And all these anabolics are coming to Europe, to the United States.
translation.zh:
所有这些合成类固醇
都进入欧洲 美国

translation.en: It's the same like in Russia.
translation.zh: 跟俄罗斯一样

translation.en: Of course, at that time in Russia, as the head of laboratory,
translation.zh:
当然 那时候作为
俄罗斯实验室的负责人

translation.en: I was a part of system.
translation.zh: 我属于那个系统

translation.en: There are three or four top-level witch doctors,
translation.zh: 有三四名顶级的医生

translation.en: like Portugalov.
translation.zh: 比如博图加洛夫

translation.en: Portugalov was the famous anabolic coach of Russian national team.
translation.zh:
博图加洛夫是俄罗斯国家队
著名的合成类固醇队医

translation.en: It was Soviet time. He was before me.
translation.zh: 那还是在苏联时期 他在我之前入行

translation.en: Portugalov is conveyor of athletes.
translation.zh: 博图加洛夫是运动员的传送机

translation.en: He has his own protocols, and he really had great success.
translation.zh:
他有自己的用药方案
他真的也非常成功

translation.en: And then they became Olympic champions.
translation.zh: 后来那些运动员成了奥运冠军

translation.en: The problem began in 2008.
translation.zh: 问题开始于2008年

translation.en: Jacques Rogge, the president of the Olympics,
translation.zh: 国际奥委会主席雅克罗格

translation.en: told government of China,
translation.zh: 告诉中国政府

translation.en: "You are Olympic country, but you are producing anabolics in bulk.
translation.zh:
“你们是奥运举办国
但你们在大量生产合成类固醇

translation.en: You cannot do like this anymore. Stop it."
translation.zh: 你们不能再这样 必须停止”

translation.en: They stop it. Officially.
translation.zh: 他们停止了 官方叫停的

translation.en: But who is supplying steroids to national team?
translation.zh: 但是谁向国家队提供类固醇呢？

translation.en: Before, there was not any concern.
translation.zh: 以前 没有任何问题

translation.en: You buy stanozolol, it's stanozolol.
translation.zh: 你买康力龙 就是康力龙

translation.en: But Portugalov was so confident,
translation.zh: 但博图加洛夫非常自信

translation.en: offering and providing things which were not proven or tested.
translation.zh: 敢提供未经证明或测试的东西

translation.en: They have impurities which could be detectable.
translation.zh: 其中含有可能检测出来的杂质

translation.en: "Oh," Portugalov say. "What to do? I spent so much money for this.
translation.zh:
“噢” 博图加洛夫说
“怎么办？我花了那么多钱呢

translation.en: Maybe you could advise to do?"
translation.zh: 或许你能给点建议？”

translation.en: What advice? Drop it to the trash.
translation.zh: 什么建议？把它扔进垃圾桶

translation.en: Now, in Moscow laboratory,
translation.zh: 现在在莫斯科实验室

translation.en: we had the best sensitivity and detection limits.
translation.zh: 我们具备最佳的灵敏性和检测极限

translation.en: I'm very proud that I created the test for long term metabolites,
translation.zh:
我非常自豪的是
我创建了对长期代谢物的检测

translation.en: which caused the detection window
translation.zh: 这使得检测窗口期

translation.en: to enlarge from two or three weeks to six months.
translation.zh: 从两三周延长到了六个月

translation.en: That's why Portugalov suddenly had so many positives.
translation.zh:
所以博图加洛夫突然
检出这么多阳性

translation.en: All people on the national team,
translation.zh: 国家队的所有人

translation.en: they came to ask where to get these steroids.
translation.zh: 他们都跑来问从哪可以弄到类固醇

translation.en: I knew one source.
translation.zh: 我知道一处来源

translation.en: Suddenly, I was coordinating the whole steroid program.
translation.zh: 突然间 我协调了整个类固醇计划

translation.en: [Fogel] So you were cutting out Portugalov?
translation.zh: 这么说你把博图加洛夫排挤出去了？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Yes, but what I was doing,
translation.zh: 对 但那时候我做的事

translation.en: I was saving national team from purchasing dirty steroids.
translation.zh:
我是在阻止国家队
购买来路不正的类固醇

translation.en: Eventually, I don't know whether it was by purpose,
translation.zh: 结果 我不知道是不是故意的

translation.en: I fight with Portugalov.
translation.zh: 我跟博图加洛夫较上劲了

translation.en: Then I became enemy.
translation.zh: 然后我成了敌人

translation.en: Criminal narcotic police came to my home, they took my computer,
translation.zh:
毒品犯罪警察到我家里来
他们收走了我的电脑

translation.en: and they said, "Then we arrest you on Monday."
translation.zh: 他们说：“我们周一会逮捕你”

translation.en: I was in such depression and my will was paralyzed.
translation.zh: 我很抑郁 我的意志夭折了

translation.en: And I decided to escape, I don't know how.
translation.zh: 我决定出逃 我不知道怎样逃

translation.en: I took some knife from...
translation.zh: 我拿了一把刀…

translation.en: very, very sharp... from my wife's kitchen.
translation.zh: 非常锋利…我从厨房拿的

translation.en: I drank whiskey, I sit to the bath.
translation.zh: 我喝了威士忌 坐在浴缸里

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: And... it was...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: It goes so smooth.
translation.zh: 很轻易割破了

translation.en: Then, in the water, I see how blood is doing like this.
translation.zh: 然后 我看到水中的血流

translation.en: It wasn't very strong, the lock.
translation.zh: 卫生间门锁不是很牢固

translation.en: My wife opened door.
translation.zh: 我妻子把门打开了

translation.en: My heart was seared.
translation.zh: 我做了心脏手术

translation.en: It was very good surgeon.
translation.zh: 手术医生非常好

translation.en: And since I was considered to be suicide...
translation.zh: 自从我被认定是自杀后…

translation.en: I was sent to a psychiatric clinic.
translation.zh: （深渊） …就被送进了精神病诊所

translation.en: After seeing that I am depressed,
translation.zh: 发现我抑郁之后

translation.en: they started to give me such crazy drugs.
translation.zh: 他们开始给我用疯狂的药物

translation.en: I was totally out of reality.
translation.zh: 我完全抽离现实了

translation.en: And then again, something happened.
translation.zh: 后来又出事了

translation.en: The criminal police,
translation.zh: 刑事警察

translation.en: they sentence me to another psychiatric clinic...
translation.zh: 把我转移到另一家精神病诊所

translation.en: which is for those who are sadist,
translation.zh: 那是专门收治虐待狂的

translation.en: who are totally worst-of-the-worst criminals.
translation.zh: 那些人都是罪大恶极的罪犯

translation.en: They respected me very much. [chuckles] I was called "professor."
translation.zh: 他们非常尊重我 管我叫“教授”

translation.en: But I get better, better, better.
translation.zh: 但我情况越来越好转

translation.en: The most funny thing, they allowed me to use computer,
translation.zh: 最有意思的是 他们允许我使用电脑

translation.en: so I was working in psychiatric clinic like a head of laboratory director,
translation.zh:
所以我在精神病诊所内
像实验室主任一样工作

translation.en: advising the whole Russian national team.
translation.zh: 给整个俄罗斯国家队提供建议

translation.en: That time,
translation.zh: 那时候

translation.en: I received, from Olympic Committee, an invitation to London,
translation.zh: 我收到奥委会的邀请 请我前往伦敦

translation.en: 2012 Olympic Games, being the director.
translation.zh: 2012年奥运会 以主任的身份

translation.en: Russian ministry was little bit uncertain that I'm criminal in full.
translation.zh:
俄罗斯体育部还有点不确定
我是不是真的有罪

translation.en: But WADA said,
translation.zh: 但WADA说

translation.en: "If not Rodchenkov, we don't see in Russia any other candidate than him.
translation.zh:
“若不是罗杰琴科夫
我们在俄罗斯找不出其他人选

translation.en: If you don't send him to London, we send to London another director."
translation.zh:
如果你们不把他送到伦敦
我们会给伦敦派另一名主任”

translation.en: You can imagine how important
translation.zh: 你可以想象伦敦实验室的信息

translation.en: information from London laboratory is for national team.
translation.zh: 对国家队来说有多重要

translation.en: I had information, what testing this London laboratory is doing,
translation.zh:
我掌握了信息
这个伦敦实验室在做什么检测

translation.en: to understand where we are and how much is danger.
translation.zh: 了解我们处于什么境况 有多危险

translation.en: Without this, all Russian doping situation will be collapsed.
translation.zh:
没有这些信息 整个俄罗斯
兴奋剂形势将会崩塌

translation.en: Thanks to God, Mutko understood this.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 姆特科理解这一点

translation.en: I received a call from the Moscow investigators.
translation.zh:
我接到莫斯科调查员
打来的一通电话

translation.en: "Grigory...
translation.zh: “格里戈里…

translation.en: your case is dropped."
translation.zh: 你的案子撤销了”

translation.en: Who took care of it? Who got the charges dropped?
translation.zh: 是谁指使的？谁让指控撤销了？

translation.en: Putin. Of course.
translation.zh: 当然是普京

translation.en: It's my redemption. Success in Sochi instead of being in prison.
translation.zh:
我要将功赎罪 让索契冬奥成功
而不是进监狱

translation.en: [in Russian] We are two workers, Kamaev and Rodchenkov,
translation.zh:
我们有两名工作人员
卡马耶夫和罗杰琴科夫

translation.en: with a mission in mind...
translation.zh: 心里装着任务…

translation.en: This is not a mission. This is a revolution.
translation.zh: 这不是任务 是革命

translation.en: -This is an anti-WADA strategy. -Of course! Of course!
translation.zh:
-这是反WADA的战略
-当然！

translation.en: [woman] The former head of Russia's anti-doping agency RUSADA
translation.zh: 俄罗斯反兴奋剂机构前主任

translation.en: has unexpectedly died.
translation.zh: 意外死亡

translation.en: Nikita Kamaev's death comes just two months after he resigned his post,
translation.zh:
尼基塔卡马耶夫死于
他辞职两个月之后

translation.en: which is, obviously, following the doping scandal that has rocked Russia
translation.zh:
明显是在震惊全俄罗斯
和全世界体育界的

translation.en: -and the rest of the world in athletics. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 兴奋剂丑闻之后

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I have to see.
translation.zh: 我必须看看

translation.en: [man] We're told by RUSADA,
translation.zh: 俄罗斯反兴奋剂机构

translation.en: which is the doping agency he was formerly the head of,
translation.zh:
也就是他之前领导的兴奋剂机构
告诉我们

translation.en: that he appears to have had a massive heart attack.
translation.zh: 他疑似严重的心脏病发作

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Bryan?
translation.zh: 布莱恩？

translation.en: I'm here.
translation.zh: 我在这

translation.en: You know, my friend?
translation.zh: 我的朋友？

translation.en: My friend...
translation.zh: 我的朋友…

translation.en: died.
translation.zh: 死了

translation.en: I show you.
translation.zh: 我给你看

translation.en: [man] He's got no previous history of heart problems.
translation.zh: 他以前没有心脏病史

translation.en: It means, "Grigory, Nikita died."
translation.zh:
这句意思是
“格里戈里 尼基塔死了”

translation.en: [man] He just died. And so, it's an enormous shock.
translation.zh: 他就这么死了 真是震惊

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] He's my friend since school time, and he never complained about his heart
translation.zh:
我们上学时就是朋友
他从来没说过心脏有问题

translation.en: or any health problem, and...
translation.zh: 或者有健康问题…

translation.en: He had a young wife.
translation.zh: 他的妻子还年轻

translation.en: They dreamed about children. I was talking to him day before.
translation.zh:
他们之前还想着生孩子
我前天还跟他聊天

translation.en: This is...
translation.zh: 这真是…

translation.en: Still, I cannot understand.
translation.zh: 我还是无法理解

translation.en: It cannot be like this.
translation.zh: 不可能成这个样子

translation.en: He wrote book.
translation.zh: 他之前还写书

translation.en: It's dangerous to write book in Russia.
translation.zh: 在俄罗斯写书是危险的事

translation.en: [Fogel] I don't know. We gotta figure this out, because...
translation.zh: 不知道 我们必须弄清楚 因为…

translation.en: Of course, of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Do you think that they would...
translation.zh: 你觉得他们会…

translation.en: Bryan, we are playing the most danger game in the history of sport.
translation.zh:
布莱恩 我们在玩体育史上
最危险的游戏

translation.en: WADA, ready to pay everything for me and for you to disappear.
translation.zh:
WADA准备不惜一切代价
让你我消失

translation.en: Because we destroy not only their future, we destroy their past.
translation.zh:
因为咱们毁掉的不仅是他们的未来
还毁了他们的过去

translation.en: You know, there is very bad man still not mentioned.
translation.zh: 还有个大坏蛋没有提及

translation.en: Deputy Minister Mutko.
translation.zh: 副部长姆特科

translation.en: He could kill everybody.
translation.zh: 他可以遇神杀神

translation.en: He's a KGB man.
translation.zh: 他是克格勃的人

translation.en: He's very dangerous. He has no moral at all. No, no.
translation.zh: 他非常危险 根本无道德可言

translation.en: "Oh, Nikita is writing book?
translation.zh: “尼基塔在写书？

translation.en: Fifty-two. Oh, he's tired.
translation.zh: 52岁 噢 他累了

translation.en: He's desperate.
translation.zh: 他绝望了

translation.en: Oh, please, prepare obituary for the next week."
translation.zh: 拜托 准备下星期的讣告吧”

translation.en: Can you imagine? I can imagine easily.
translation.zh: 你能想象吗？我很容易就能想象到

translation.en: We should be very much careful.
translation.zh: 我们应该相当谨慎

translation.en: [Fogel] Who were you reporting to?
translation.zh: 你在向谁报告？

translation.en: Yuri Nagornykh, vice minister.
translation.zh: 尤里纳格尤科 副部长

translation.en: He was practically involved in everyday routine.
translation.zh: 他几乎参与了每天的日常事务

translation.en: -[Fogel] So you would report to Yuri? -[Rodchenkov] Yes.
translation.zh: 所以你会向尤里报告？ 是的

translation.en: -[Fogel] Yuri would report to Mutko? -[Rodchenkov] Yes.
translation.zh: 尤里会向姆特科报告？ 是的

translation.en: -[Fogel] And Mutko reported to Putin? -[Rodchenkov] To Putin, yes.
translation.zh: 姆特科向普京报告？ 向普京 对

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] You know, there is no rest if you are paranoid.
translation.zh: （2016年3月9日） 如果得了妄想症 那你就没法休息了

translation.en: [Fogel] It was around 12:30, one o'clock at night?
translation.zh: 夜里12点半 1点？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Or two. I don't know.
translation.zh: 还是2点…我不知道

translation.en: They were just hanging around, so...
translation.zh: 他们就在周围徘徊 所以…

translation.en: -[Fogel] Somebody in the courtyard? -[Rodchenkov] Yes.
translation.zh: 有人在庭院里？ 对

translation.en: Two strong men knocked my door and appeared from darkness.
translation.zh: 两个壮汉敲我的门 从黑暗中现身

translation.en: They asked me to let them in, and they came here.
translation.zh: 他们叫我让他们进去 他们过来了

translation.en: And we were talking about sport, about many relevant or auxiliary things.
translation.zh:
然后我们就聊体育
聊了很多相关的事

translation.en: They knew about death of Nikita Kamaev.
translation.zh: 他们得知尼基塔卡马耶夫的死讯了

translation.en: About, first of all, my boss, Minister Mutko.
translation.zh: 当然也知道我的上级姆特科部长

translation.en: It was inspection and... [mutters]
translation.zh: 检查和…

translation.en: exhausts my nerves...
translation.zh: 弄得我精疲力尽

translation.en: They finally gave me subpoena.
translation.zh: 最后他们给我法院传票

translation.en: United States district court.
translation.zh: 美国联邦地区法院

translation.en: You see, it's for me. "To Grigory Rodchenkov."
translation.zh:
看吧 这是给我的
“致格里戈里罗杰琴科夫”

translation.en: [Fogel] You're commanded to appear in front of the grand jury.
translation.zh: 你被命令出现在大陪审团面前

translation.en: [Ed Stier] He had been approached by two FBI agents.
translation.zh: 两位联邦调查局探员来找过他

translation.en: They want him to go to New York
translation.zh: 他们希望他到纽约去

translation.en: and appear in a grand jury and provide his information.
translation.zh:
到大陪审团面前去
提供他掌握的信息 （埃德斯蒂尔
制片商法律顾问）

translation.en: It triggered a whole series of decisions that had to be made.
translation.zh: 这导致必须做出一系列决定

translation.en: I've checked out these two guys,
translation.zh: 我已经查过这俩人了

translation.en: and both of these guys are not your everyday agent.
translation.zh: 他俩不是每天来盯你的探员

translation.en: [Cogan] But why did they come to him?
translation.zh: 但他们为什么要从他下手？

translation.en: They want him for something else that they're doing.
translation.zh: 他们希望他对他们正在做的事出力

translation.en: They didn't come to him for himself.
translation.zh: 他们不单纯地是为他而来

translation.en: They're trying to make a case,
translation.zh:
（达恩科根 制片人） 明显 他们试图找到证据
他们发现他在洛杉矶

translation.en: and they found out he was in LA.
translation.zh:
明显 他们试图找到证据
他们发现他在洛杉矶

translation.en: His boss, Mutko, was actually the guy.
translation.zh: 他的上级姆特科就是那个人

translation.en: [lawyer] How was he able to survive?
translation.zh: 那他为什么能活着？

translation.en: Because he's Putin's best friend. He's the head of the sports ministry.
translation.zh:
因为他是普京最好的朋友
他是体育部部长

translation.en: Just what sort of, uh... crime...
translation.zh: 我可能犯下什么 违反

translation.en: like, example, I could be done against or under US legislature?
translation.zh: 美国法律的罪行吗？

translation.en: The United States Justice Department loves to charge broad conspiracies.
translation.zh: 美国司法部喜欢起诉广泛的阴谋

translation.en: That's their favorite charging instrument.
translation.zh: 那是他们最喜欢的起诉工具

translation.en: That you conspired with Mutko and others to--
translation.zh:
也就是说你跟姆特科
以及其他人合谋…

translation.en: What is the conspiracy? It was conspiracy since 1980.
translation.zh:
合谋什么？
那是从1980年就开始的阴谋

translation.en: Let's reconsider Moscow Olympic Games,
translation.zh: 我们再回顾一下莫斯科奥运会

translation.en: and then reconsider situation in United States in 1984.
translation.zh: 然后再想想1984年美国的情形

translation.en: [lawyer] That's right.
translation.zh:
-卡特林怎么会…这…
-没错

translation.en: They're looking for him to plea to what's called a cooperation agreement.
translation.zh: 他们希望他同意所谓的合作协议

translation.en: What happens is, he cooperates, and at the end of the day,
translation.zh: 事实是 他合作了 到最后

translation.en: the judge generally wouldn't incarcerate him, most likely.
translation.zh: 法官一般很有可能不会判他监禁

translation.en: [Stier] First of all, we don't know whether that's...
translation.zh: 首先 我们不知道那是否…

translation.en: what the bureau's interested in at this point.
translation.zh: 就是联邦调查局目前感兴趣的东西

translation.en: [lawyer] If we turn down, they could indict him.
translation.zh: 我们要是拒绝 他们就可以起诉他

translation.en: -[Fogel] You gotta be shitting me. -We can talk to these guys.
translation.zh:
-你这是在忽悠我吧
-我们可以跟这些人聊聊这事

translation.en: [Stier] The most important thing is he is not sent back to Russia,
translation.zh: 最重要的是他不会被送回俄罗斯

translation.en: where he would certainly be assassinated.
translation.zh: 回那里他肯定会被暗杀

translation.en: [Fogel] We've been discussing with Grigory whether or not he should go public in some way
translation.zh:
我们一直在跟格里戈里讨论
他会否应该在某种程度上把事情公开

translation.en: prior to the Olympics.
translation.zh: 趁着奥运会之前

translation.en: [Stier] Prior to the Olympics. What you're saying is
translation.zh: 奥运会之前 他们说的是

translation.en: if he's established as a cooperating witness,
translation.zh: 如果他被确定为合作证人

translation.en: he may not be able to do that.
translation.zh: 那他可能无法做到

translation.en: [lawyer] That's right. That's right. Which is a downside.
translation.zh: 没错 那是不利的一面

translation.en: [Stier] But once Grigory's public, I think he's in much less danger.
translation.zh:
但一旦格里戈里公开
我想他会少些危险

translation.en: Because if the Russians do anything to hurt him,
translation.zh:
因为那时如果俄罗斯人
做任何伤害他的事

translation.en: it makes them look very guilty.
translation.zh: 都会让他们看上去罪大恶极

translation.en: [lawyer] Except they'll just say he had a heart attack, like they did...
translation.zh:
除了他们会说
他有心脏病 就像他们对…

translation.en: [Fogel] Grigory, look at me.
translation.zh: 格里戈里 看着我

translation.en: Is it in your best interest to break the story?
translation.zh: 把事情说破对你最有利吗？

translation.en: You mean to disclose? We have to disclose.
translation.zh: 你是说揭露？我们必须揭露

translation.en: [automated voice] Please enter your participant ID. Thank you.
translation.zh: 请输入您的参与者ID 谢谢 （2016年5月5日至7日）

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] I strongly suggest they stay only with list of 36 athletes.
translation.zh:
（会面三天 提供访问和证据） 我强烈建议他们
只关注那份有36名运动员的名单

translation.en: [Fogel] Okay. But they're about to publish.
translation.zh: 但他们就要出版了

translation.en: They're asking us how they can verify the authenticity of the Sochi list.
translation.zh:
他们问我们要怎样证实
索契冬奥会名单的真实性

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Yes, this is most important. It's authentic document.
translation.zh: 对 这是最重要的 这是真实的文件

translation.en: It was in Sochi on my table.
translation.zh: 索契冬奥会时 就放在我桌上

translation.en: And if you go behind this list, there is creation date.
translation.zh: 你看看名单背面 还有创建日期

translation.en: [Fogel] And this list came from the ministry?
translation.zh: 这份名单是从体育部流出来的？

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Of course, of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: [Fogel] So, Rebecca, you have the file.
translation.zh: 丽贝卡 你有那份文件

translation.en: So under properties of the file, you can see it was created
translation.zh: 在文件属性下面 就能看到创建日期

translation.en: Tuesday, January 21st, from the ministry.
translation.zh: 是1月21日星期二 来自体育部

translation.en: [Fogel] Oh, my God! You're unrecognizable!
translation.zh: （2016年5月11日） 老天！都没法认出你！

translation.en: Not recognizable at all.
translation.zh: 根本认不出来

translation.en: Psychological, looking in mirror, it's not me.
translation.zh: 从心理上 照着镜子 不是我

translation.en: TheNew York Times is breaking tomorrow.
translation.zh: 《纽约时报》明天会发布

translation.en: -Tomorrow? -Tomorrow.
translation.zh:
-明天？
-明天

translation.en: Oh, I need... I need... [sighs]
translation.zh: 我需要…

translation.en: intravenous injections
translation.zh: 静脉注射

translation.en: -to relax. Tomorrow? -Tomorrow.
translation.zh: 才能放松 明天吗？

translation.en: -[Rodchenkov] Why not? -Okay, so here's what's happening.
translation.zh:
-为什么不呢？
-好吧 事情是这样的

translation.en: [Fogel] Have you spoke to the Department of Justice yet?
translation.zh: 你跟司法部说过了吗？

translation.en: [lawyer on phone] I told them,
translation.zh: 我今天下午晚点告诉他们的

translation.en: and they reacted like I expected they would.
translation.zh: 他们像我预想的那样反应

translation.en: They're upset.
translation.zh: 他们很懊恼

translation.en: -Right. -So...
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: They wanted to know, did he provide any documents to them?
translation.zh:
他们想知道
他有没有为他们提供任何文档？

translation.en: [Fogel] He provided lists of doped athletes.
translation.zh: 他提供了使用兴奋剂的运动员名单

translation.en: He provided an FSB file of how the testing was arranged at Sochi.
translation.zh:
他提供了一份俄罗斯联邦安全局文件
是关于在索契如何安排检测

translation.en: Yeah, unfortunately, they're gonna terminate the whole...
translation.zh: 对 不幸的是 他们会终止整个…

translation.en: Now that he turned over documents, they're gonna cancel.
translation.zh: 既然他翻阅过文档 那他们就会取消

translation.en: And they're just gonna prosecute him.
translation.zh: 他们会起诉他

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] "It's time for you to enter upon the second stage."
translation.zh: “你是时候进入第二阶段了”

translation.en: [Jacques Rogge] The International Olympic Committee has the honor of announcing
translation.zh: 国际奥林匹克委员会很荣幸地宣布…

translation.en: that the 22nd Olympic Winter Games in 2014
translation.zh: （2007年7月） …2014年第22届冬季奥运会

translation.en: are awarded to the city of Sochi.
translation.zh: 将由索契市主办 （雅克罗格）

translation.en: That's future for everything. That's future for my country! For Russia!
translation.zh:
那是一切的未来
是我的国家的未来！为俄罗斯欢呼！

translation.en: Millions of citizens of Russia are united by the Olympic dream.
translation.zh: 数百万俄罗斯市民团结在奥运梦想下

translation.en: Our national pledge to you is, the choice of Sochi is the best choice.
translation.zh:
我们全国的承诺是
索契的选择是最佳选择

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] There is a top-level decision.
translation.zh: 有个高层决定

translation.en: You know who I mean.
translation.zh: 你知道我说的是谁

translation.en: And big boss, Vladimir Putin, saying,
translation.zh: 老大弗拉基米尔普京说

translation.en: "We have to show the best result in Sochi.
translation.zh: “我们必须在索契拿出最好的结果

translation.en: We must show the others who we are."
translation.zh: 我们必须向他人展现实力”

translation.en: -[man] Hurrah! -[crowd] Hurrah!
translation.zh:
-万岁！
-万岁！

translation.en: Hurrah!
translation.zh: 万岁！

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] We could make team clean before Sochi. One month.
translation.zh:
在索契之前 我们只要一个月
就可以把他们变“干净”

translation.en: But it was decided to use PEDs during Sochi.
translation.zh:
但他们决定在索契期间
使用有助于提高成绩的药物

translation.en: Through the competition so they could be at their very top level?
translation.zh:
在比赛期间
这样他们就能保持超高水准？

translation.en: Right, right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [announcer] Vladimir Putin.
translation.zh: 弗拉基米尔普京

translation.en: [Fogel] So instead of using the science,
translation.zh: 所以你没有利用科学

translation.en: the science that you developed to get around the system,
translation.zh: 你开发来逃避整个系统的科学

translation.en: you abandoned the science?
translation.zh: 而是抛弃了科学？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: The most important "yes." Forget about this.
translation.zh: 最重要的“是的” 算了吧

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 女士们先生们

translation.en: let me declare the 126th session of the International Olympic Committee
translation.zh:
我宣布国际奥林匹克委员会
第126届会议

translation.en: open.
translation.zh: 开幕

translation.en: -Thank you. -[audience applauding]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] Opening ceremony was the most heartbreaking day...
translation.zh:
开幕式在体育史上
最令人心碎的那天…

translation.en: in sports history.
translation.zh: …举行

translation.en: -Hi, Bryan. -The story just broke.
translation.zh:
-嗨 布莱恩
-报道发了

translation.en: [stammering] What do you mean? Is it published or not?
translation.zh: 什么意思？出版了没有？

translation.en: -Yes, published. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 对 出版了

translation.en: Published! The story is published!
translation.zh: 报道出版了！

translation.en: [man on TV] According to The New York Times, Rodchenkov...
translation.zh:
（奥运兴奋剂指控） 据《纽约时报》报道
格里戈里罗杰琴科夫

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: This is the photo of bottles.
translation.zh: 这是瓶子的照片

translation.en: Those bottles were given from Nikita Kamaev.
translation.zh: 那些瓶子是尼基塔卡马耶夫给我的

translation.en: "Grigory Rodchenkov, who ran the laboratory
translation.zh: “格里戈里罗杰琴科夫 实验室负责人

translation.en: that handled testing for thousands of Olympians,
translation.zh:
负责为成千上万的奥运选手
执行检测

translation.en: said he developed a three-drug cocktail of banned substances
translation.zh: 声称他将三种违禁药物调和到一起

translation.en: that he mixed with liquor and provided to dozens of Russian athletes,
translation.zh:
与酒混合后
提供给几十名俄罗斯运动员

translation.en: helping to facilitate one of the most elaborate
translation.zh: 打造了体育史上最周密

translation.en: and successful doping ploys in sport history."
translation.zh: 最成功的兴奋剂使用策略”

translation.en: [Thomas Bach] Join and support our fight for fair play.
translation.zh: （2014年2月） 加入我们 一起为公平比赛而奋斗

translation.en: The athletes deserve it.
translation.zh: 运动员们值得如此

translation.en: And to you, my fellow Olympic athletes,
translation.zh:
（托马斯巴赫
国际奥委会主席） 对于你们 我亲爱的奥运健儿们

translation.en: I say, respect the rules, play fair, be clean.
translation.zh:
我要说 尊重规则
公平竞赛 远离兴奋剂

translation.en: [Fogel] In 2014, in Sochi,
translation.zh: 2014年 在索契

translation.en: did Russia swap out dirty urine for clean urine?
translation.zh:
俄罗斯是不是用干净的尿液
替换染药尿液了？

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 一向如此

translation.en: [narrator] The information contained in this little bottle
translation.zh: 这个小瓶子中包含的信息

translation.en: helps keep sport on the level playing field.
translation.zh: 有助于保持体育的公平竞争环境

translation.en: That's why we created ADAMS,
translation.zh: （2015年WADA发布） 所以我们才创建了ADAMS

translation.en: the free Anti-Doping Administration and Management System from WADA.
translation.zh:
即WADA开发的免费的
反兴奋剂运行管理系统

translation.en: All operating under a level of security typically used by financial institutions.
translation.zh:
所有操作都采用金融机构常用的
安全级别

translation.en: In effect, becoming the centralized clearing house
translation.zh: 实际上 它成了所有反兴奋剂信息的

translation.en: for all anti-doping information.
translation.zh: 中央交换所

translation.en: ADAMS. Everyone should play true.
translation.zh: ADAMS 人人都应当诚实竞争

translation.en: [Fogel] Walk us through the collection process.
translation.zh: 带我们过一遍收集过程

translation.en: [Dick Pound] The sample is provided in front of a doping control officer.
translation.zh: 将样本带到兴奋剂控制官员面前

translation.en: It's in this container. It's divided into two.
translation.zh: 就在这个容器内 然后一分为二

translation.en: [Fogel] The A sample and the B sample. These are the...
translation.zh: A样本和B样本 二者都…

translation.en: -[Catlin] Bottles. -[Fogel] They're called the Bereg-Kits?
translation.zh:
-瓶子
-这些叫博瑞格器材套件？

translation.en: Yes. It's one particular company in Switzerland that makes them.
translation.zh: （博瑞格器材套件） 对 是瑞士一家特别的公司生产的

translation.en: [McLaren] It's called the Berlinger bottle,
translation.zh: 叫博瑞格样品瓶

translation.en: and the Berlinger bottle is state of the art.
translation.zh: 博瑞格样品瓶是最先进的工艺

translation.en: It's sealed very tight with a vice-like device.
translation.zh: 用牢固的设备密封得非常严实

translation.en: A collector is right there, watching.
translation.zh: 收集员会在那边观察

translation.en: And then it goes to the lab.
translation.zh: 然后把尿液送入实验室

translation.en: It's in the lab that the B bottles are pulled aside and put in the freezer.
translation.zh:
进实验室后
B瓶被放进旁边的冰箱里

translation.en: The analytical work is done on the A sample.
translation.zh: 对A样本做分析工作

translation.en: [Olivier Rabin] The way we collect the sample, the trustability of the sample,
translation.zh: 我们采集样本的方式 样本的可信度

translation.en: the fact that we've got an A and a B sample
translation.zh: 我们有A和B两份样本…

translation.en: is a very, very, uh, safe system.
translation.zh: （奥利维尔拉宾博士） …是个非常安全的系统

translation.en: [McLaren] The caps on the bottles,
they're designed in such a way that they need to be destroyed to be taken off.
translation.zh: 设计成必须要毁坏才能揭开

translation.en: [Catlin] In the lab, they have a device that cracks open the A sample.
translation.zh:
在实验室里 他们有个设备
可以撬开A样本

translation.en: It's the only way you can get it off.
translation.zh: 那是你唯一能开瓶盖的方式

translation.en: [Pound] If an A sample tests positive, then the B gets analyzed.
translation.zh:
如果A样本检测结果为阳性
那会继续分析B样本

translation.en: The B has to confirm the A.
translation.zh: B样本是用来确认A样本的

translation.en: That's this enormous protection.
translation.zh: 这是一种强大的保护

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] From Nagornykh, in preparation to Sochi,
translation.zh:
据纳格尤科
在准备索契冬奥会的过程中

translation.en: it was strict order to develop procedure how we can have new bottles,
translation.zh: 对于使用新瓶子 新瓶盖或开瓶盖

translation.en: new caps or open cap.
translation.zh: 都下了严格的命令 开发相应的程序

translation.en: And this FSB officer,
translation.zh: 这位俄罗斯联邦安全局官员

translation.en: he was responsible for the day when I gave closed Bereg-Kit,
translation.zh:
我送封闭的博瑞格器材套件去时
是他值班

translation.en: and after half an hour, I receive it opened.
translation.zh: 半小时后 我收到的是打开的

translation.en: And the...
translation.zh: 而且…

translation.en: cap and the bottle are the same.
translation.zh: 盖子和瓶子没有变

translation.en: And I can... [imitates pouring]
translation.zh: 我可以…

translation.en: a little bit rinse and then pour and close.
translation.zh: 稍微冲洗一下 然后倒入样本并封闭

translation.en: Like Bereg-Kit.
translation.zh: 跟博瑞格器材套件一样
